sourcesContent:
Esta es la Fotos Page

Contenido de la Fotos Page

{{image.dsc}}



import {Component} from '@angular/core'; import {Foto} from "../../models/foto.model"; import {ActivatedRoute, Router} from "@angular/router"; import {FotosService} from "../../services/fotos.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-fotos-page', templateUrl: './fotos-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./fotos-page.component.css'] }) export class FotosPageComponent { images: Foto[] = []; constructor( private readonly router: Router, private readonly route: ActivatedRoute, private fotos: FotosService ) { } ngOnInit() { this.images = this.fotos.getFotos(); } verImagen(image: Foto): void { this.router.navigate(['/paginas/fotos-details-page', image.id], {relativeTo: this.route}); } }
